reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater well-made and warm, particularly appreciating its suitability for cold sunny days.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and price! I bought on sale at about $35
items.body: I absolutely Love it!!! I’m 5’2” 162 lbs and purchased the xl. It hangs to my ankles and has enough to wrap around my front. Feels like a warm hug on a cold day! So nice quality, thick, warm and beautiful. My 17 yr old daughter frequently requests to borrow it! It fits her nicely as well. She’s 5’5” about 150lbs. It hangs just above her ankles. She doesn’t know yet but she’ll have her own at Christmas… Read more
items.author: curly girl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A++ Sweater & I’m very pleased‼️Besides who doesn’t need a great sweater for these colder months?
items.body: The sweater is truly beautiful, the quality is exceptional, & the company that made this sweater adhered to strict craftsmanship as well. I’m pleased that I’ve received a sweater which stands up to its advertisement & description completely w/o any deception, (we all have dealt with the unfortunate situation of receiving poor quality merchandise that doesn’t match the advertised description at all, when purchasing from many companies online). This sweater is thick, soft, durable & of good quality in all respects. I used to be a seamstress so I know what good quality is & I “expect this” when I purchase clothing. The this sweater is honestly timeless so it’ll never go out of style. The fit is on point, I usually wear a large size & this sweater is still loose enough so that it compliments my thick figure as I’m 5’1” & my weight is 168. Of course it’s long on my short stature but I love this actually! The color is a beautiful pine tree green, (as shown on the advertisement, which can be tricky because of the challenges with pixels, but not this time!), it’s so vibrant & beautiful for this upcoming Christmas Season, or any time of the colder months of the year. If you’d like purchase a sweater clip on Amazon if you’d like the sweater to be closed in the front as I do; as this is an open front sweater version. I simply can’t say enough about this beautiful sweater as it is perfect in all respects. Wash on cold to preserve the color, & block it flat to dry in order to save its shape; as I do with all of my good quality sweaters & they’ll last forever. I sincerely appreciate you Seller, because you have created a great quantity sweater that is simply gorgeous & it stands “true” according to your advertisement. I am also a retired Executive for the worlds largest foods & drinks sector which I only mention, because I have high standards for anything I purchase, & I know good quality & a good business when I encounter them. This company meets my expectations on this product. I will definitely purchase this sweater in other colors & for gifts in the future. Read more
items.author: CCD

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and warm.
items.body: Exactly what I hoped! Warm, snuggly, heavy, and I love the deep pockets! I got a lot of compliments!!!! I’m 5’1”, 135lbs. And I got a large. I love it! Read more
items.author: Debra K

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Recommend
items.body: Makes it own lint for some reason, but cute and comfortable. Keeps you warm. Read more
items.author: Georgia Gal

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars For The Love Of A Great Cardigan
items.body: Oh My I Can't Say Enough About These Sweaters I Love Them So Much I Literally Have Bought Every Color. Perfect Thickness, Length, Color & All With Pockets I Throw One On With Any & Everything I Got The XL Im 5'6 weigh 190 Lbs Read more
items.author: Mrs. Shae

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality and style
items.body: I love these coats! They fit loose and you can wear with pants or dresses. Length is definitely long unless you are very tall. I washed mine and it turned out perfect. If you don’t like pockets maybe this is not for you because they are prominent- I like the look. I can dress it up or down and thought the quality was very good for the price. Also this is not what I would call a thin coat (I like that) but it’s also not a coat to wear in very cold weather for me. Read more
items.author: Rhonda Faber Green

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Who sister loved it?
items.body: My sister loves this sweater and she looks cute in it. It’s heavy good for fall, it’s long, no funny smells, vibrant color and very soft, it’s easy to style in a variety of ways. I’m going to get one for myself and another for the holidays. Read more
items.author: L. Davis

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect!
items.body: Finally I found the perfect size and length! Very comfy, warm,good quality, i love it,definitely will order in different colors too Read more
items.author: y.s

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Red Brown, Blue, Apricot, Black, Camel, Coffee, Navy Blue, Orange, Dark Red, Dark Green, Red, Khaki, Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
